## Announcements

### Man-power situation became even more critical

* HLT Tracking Validation is currently uncovered since Valentina Gori
  left
* Offline Beamspot is currently partially covered
    * Kevin Burkett expressed his desire to step down in this
      activity:
    * <font class="bold red">Since this a a Tracking POG/Physics related activity, we have
      passed the information also to Physics Coordination to try and
      find a replacement soon.</font>


### The call for the 2016/18 Tracking POG has been officially made:

1. Jan 5: call has been made
1. <font class="bold red">Feb 2: close nominations, send mail to all candidates</font>
1. Feb 9: deadline for candidates to give availability
1. Feb 12: show list of nominations to SC
1. Mar 12: propose selection of L2s to SC
1. Apr 20: proposed list of nominations to MB

* CMSSW_7_4_0_pre6: 17 February 2015 (bug fix release as needed)
